An essay to promote virtue by example in a collection of excellent sayings (divine and moral) of devout & learned men, in all ages, from the apostles time, to this present year, 1689 / By William Whitcombe, gent. Whitcombe, William.
[6], 236 [i.e. 218] p.
Printed for the author: and are to be sold by Edw. Evets ..., London: 1689.
"Licensed, March 2d. 1688/9." Title within double line border. Numerous errors in paging. Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
=======
